footer.description: A vibrant community dedicated to healthy, social, and sustainable living in the beautiful Twente region.

home.title: Welcome to Blue Zone Twente
home.description: A vibrant community dedicated to healthy, social, and sustainable living. Join us in creating a thriving ecosystem where people connect, learn, and grow together in the beautiful Twente region.
home.coreValuesSubtitle: Blue Zone Twente is built on principles that promote wellbeing, community connection, and sustainable living for all.
home.communityConnectionDesc: Building strong, supportive relationships through shared experiences, local initiatives, and meaningful interactions.
home.healthyLivingDesc: Promoting physical and mental wellbeing through nutrition, movement, mindfulness, and access to healthy local food.
home.sustainabilityDesc: Creating a regenerative future through eco-friendly practices, local food systems, and environmental stewardship.
home.communityPulseDesc: Quick questions to learn what matters most right now. Share your vote and see what the community thinks.
home.upcomingEventsSubtitle: Join us for workshops, gatherings, and community activities
home.ctaDescription: Become part of a movement dedicated to creating healthier, more connected, and sustainable communities in Twente. Together, we can make a difference.

story.title: Building a Healthier, More Connected Twente
story.subtitle: Blue Zone Twente is a living laboratory and learning network where community members come together to create lasting change.
story.originText1: In 2023, a group of passionate residents, health professionals, and sustainability advocates came together with a shared vision: to transform Twente into a region where people live longer, healthier, and happier lives.
story.originText2: Inspired by the world's Blue Zones—regions where people live measurably longer lives—we set out to create our own blueprint for wellbeing. We recognized that true health goes beyond individual choices; it's shaped by our communities, environments, and connections.
story.originText3: From community gardens to walking groups, from local food initiatives to neighborhood gatherings, Blue Zone Twente has grown into a movement of over 1,200 members across the region.
story.missionText: To create a thriving ecosystem where residents of Twente can easily access resources, connect with like-minded individuals, and participate in initiatives that promote healthy, social, and sustainable living for all.
story.visionText: A Twente where every community is a Blue Zone—where people naturally make healthy choices, where neighbors know and support each other, and where sustainable practices are woven into the fabric of daily life.

communityFirst.title: Community First
communityFirst.text: We believe in the power of collective action and mutual support. Together, we're stronger.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.text: Everyone is welcome. We celebrate diversity and create spaces where all voices are heard.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text: We share knowledge openly, communicate honestly, and build trust through clarity.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: We're committed to practices that nurture both people and planet for generations to come.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Blue Zone Twente operates as a living laboratory where ideas are tested, shared, and scaled across our communities.

connect.title: Connect
connect.text: Regular events, forums, and gatherings that bring people together around shared interests.

learn.title: Learn
learn.text: Workshops, newsletters, and resources on health, nutrition, sustainability, and community building.

act.title: Act
act.text: Support for local initiatives, from community gardens to food cooperatives to walking groups.

joinMovement.title: Be Part of the Movement
joinMovement.text: Whether you're interested in healthier eating, meeting neighbors, or contributing to sustainability initiatives, there's a place for you in Blue Zone Twente.
